description: doc/go1.1.html: add links to the text, write some new sections

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM https://codereview.appspot.com/7914043/diff/1002/doc/go1.1.html File doc/go1.1.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/7914043/diff/1002/doc/go1.1.html#newcode54 doc/go1.1.html:54: There should probably be a TODO section here for return requirements too. It was a language change. https://codereview.appspot.com/7914043/diff/1002/doc/go1.1.html#newcode164 doc/go1.1.html:164: TODO: Point to cmd/vet once it handles this. https://codereview.appspot.com/7914043/diff/1002/doc/go1.1.html#newcode165 doc/go1.1.html:165:

Changes to the go tool

Make the id gocmd and s/go tool/go command/. This matches the Go 1 release notes and also avoids confusion with the 'go tool' subcommand. https://codereview.appspot.com/7914043/diff/1002/doc/go1.1.html#newcode168 doc/go1.1.html:168: The go tool has acquired several s/tool/command/ throughout https://codereview.appspot.com/7914043/diff/1002/doc/go1.1.html#newcode240 doc/go1.1.html:240: Previous versions of the debug/elf package Please add TODO: Decide whether to keep this change. I started a conversation on CL 6848044.

Thank you. Some piddling comments. https://codereview.appspot.com/7914043/diff/1002/doc/go1.1.html File doc/go1.1.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/7914043/diff/1002/doc/go1.1.html#newcode173 doc/go1.1.html:173: First, when compiling, testing, or running Go code, the go tool will now give more detailed error messages, Thank you for fixing my poor writing. https://codereview.appspot.com/7914043/diff/1002/doc/go1.1.html#newcode558 doc/go1.1.html:558: statistics in benchmarks using the new Please add a section about -blockprofile for go test. Also passing a *profile flag to go test will invoke -c under the hood.

https://codereview.appspot.com/7914043/diff/1002/doc/go1.1.html
File doc/go1.1.html (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7914043/diff/1002/doc/go1.1.html#newcode558
doc/go1.1.html:558: statistics in benchmarks using the new
On 2013/03/19 23:37:20, dfc wrote:
> Please add a section about -blockprofile for go test. Also passing a *profile
> flag to go test will invoke -c under the hood.

the first is already a TODO. i'll add a TODO for the second

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=61c9a6a83828 ***
